game.title: The Lost Sword of Light
game.objective: Retrieve the lost sword from the Dark Forest and bring it back to the village elder.
game.description: A powerful sword has been lost in the Dark Forest, and the villagers are in need of a brave adventurer to retrieve it. The sword is said to be hidden within a cave deep within the forest, guarded by fearsome creatures.
game.reward: 100 gold coins and the gratitude of the village elder

task.objective: Enter the Dark Forest and find the cave where the sword is hidden.
task.description: You must navigate through the dense forest, avoiding traps and monsters along the way. The cave entrance is said to be hidden behind a waterfall.
task.location: Dark Forest, near the old oak tree

task.objective: Navigate through the cave and find the sword.
task.description: The cave is filled with treacherous terrain and deadly creatures. You must use your wits and bravery to overcome obstacles and reach the sword.
task.location: Cave of the Lost Sword, deep within the Dark Forest

task.objective: Return the sword to the village elder.
task.description: You must return the sword to the village elder, who will reward you for your bravery and skill.
task.location: Village Elder's Hut, near the village center
